mainText:
Dear Apple Team, 

I am very sorry for the loss of Steve Jobs.  He was a great CEO, and made Apple the strongest and most recognizable company in the world.  He will forever be in my heart.  Whenever I look at an Apple product, I see Steve Jobs, the smartest and most AMAZING man in the world.  Once again, I am very sorry for your loss.
header: I am very sorry for your loss.
author: Kasia
